column1: 10 pts - Great job identifying the business function and providing a detailed explanation of how scrum/sprint methodologies could benefit it. Keep up the good work!

12 pts - Very complete and clear description of how scrum/sprint could operate. Great job explaining the benefits of scrum/sprint for the product design process and providing a detailed example. Keep up the good work!

7 pts - Some vagueness or incompleteness in discussion of fit.

Comment: Good attempt at explaining why kanban is not suitable for certain functions, but could be more specific and clear in your explanation. Keep up the good work!

10/10 - Great job identifying the production function as the one that could benefit the most from implementing kanban methodologies. Your explanation of how kanban could operate for this function is clear and well-organized. Keep up the good work!
12 pts - Very complete and clear description of how kanban could operate. Great job in explaining the benefits and process of implementing kanban in the production function. Keep up the good work!

5 pts - Overly general description of poor fit; not specific to this function. 

Comment: Your discussion on scrum/sprint's poor fit is quite general. Please provide more specific examples related to Mighty Jaxx's functions.

5 pts - Selected bias is clearly relevant to this situation.

Great job identifying the confirmation bias and its potential impact on Jackson's decision-making process. Keep up the good work!

6 pts - Noticeable errors or misunderstanding in the definition. 

Comment: Your response contains some relevant information about agile methodologies, but it does not clearly define a specific cognitive bias that could impact Jackson's decision-making. Please focus on defining a particular bias and its potential effects on the decision.
10 pts - Reasonable description, but missing some detail. Good effort in explaining the concepts, but could use more clarity and detail in describing the possible problems. Keep up the good work!
10/10 - Excellent work! You provided a clear and detailed description of possible steps and actions for implementing the management methodologies. Keep up the great work!
